NAME: Name
SETTINGS_RESTART_DISCLAIMER: Some of these settings require the app to be restarted
SETTINGS_IMPORTFAIL: Backup either not valid or not compatible with this version of the app.
SETTINGS_ENABLELOCK: Require device unlock to start app
SETTINGS_ALTERNATE_PAGINATION: Display next / previous buttons when reading instead of swiping pages
SETTINGS_FORCENORMALLIST:
Use different list rendering 
(only enable when having issues)
SETTINGS_IMMERSIVE_READING: Enable immersive mode when reading stories
SETTINGS_LARGE_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT: Enable this if your phone has a large notch (bigger than default status bar)
SETTINGS_ONLY_STORIES_FEED: Only display new stories on the feed page (hide bio updates etc...)
SETTINGS_NAVIGATE_VOLUME_ROCKER: Turn pages with the volume rocker buttons
SETTINGS_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Want to suggest a feature, report a bug or read some more info about the app you are currently using?
UPDATE_ALREADYDONE: The most current version is already installed
COPYPROMPT_MSG: File system couldn't be accessed. Please manually copy this text and save it.
PASTEPROMPT_MSG: File system couldn't be accessed. Please manually paste the needed text here.
NOSUPPORT_MSG: Unfortunatly this function is not available on this platform.
OFFLINE_ERROR: This and a lot of other functions are not available in offline mode.
SIGNUP_MESSAGE: Return to the app and login after you registered on the site
SESSIONTIMEOUT_MSG: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
UPDATED_MSG: App successfully updated. Please log in again.
HISTORY_EMPTY: This list will show the last {{HISTORY_LIMIT}} read stories. Check out the tabs below to start reading some!
STORY_ENDOFSERIES: No more stories in this series
STORYVIEW_ERROR_IMAGE: Image could not be found on Literotica servers
AUTHOR_MISSING_STORIES: The Literotica website contains {value} more stories (illustrated and/or poetry). Click the link above to view them.
SERIES_DOWNLOAD_SIZEWARNING:
This list contains a lot of stories, are you sure you want to download them all? 
This might take a while and doesn't always work very well.
OPENLINK_DESCRIPTION: Paste a hyperlink below to open it directly in the app. You can view stories and authorpages this way.
OPENLINK_STORYWARNING: The first search result should be the correct story.
AUTHOR: Author
TITLE: Title
LITEROTICA_NOTFOUND: Either Literotica is offline, or the app is no longer up to date with the Literorica API.
LITEROTICA_TOOMANYREQUESTS: You have made too many requests and Literotica has temporarily blocked you, try again later.
LITEROTICA_TEMPOFFLINE: Literotica is temporarily offline, take a look at their website to learn more.
